data.title: Brian Keene on LinkedIn: NORQAIN Joins NYRR
data.meta_description: Proud to announce that Montres NORQAIN SA is the ¬´Official Timekeeper¬ª of the New York City Marathon!‚è±üá∫üá∏üóΩ
data.text:
NORQAIN is returning to the world‚Äôs fastest streets as the Official Timekeeper of the 50th edition of the legendary BMW BERLIN-MARATHON.‚åöüëüOn the 29. September 2024, we will be recording every step of endurance and determination along this 42.195-kilometer adventure in Berlin, with SCC EVENTS GmbH. We are beyond honored to partner up with this iconic event that embodies the values of perseverance, determination, and the pursuit of excellence, which are at the core of NORQAIN‚Äôs DNA. Celebrating the 50th year anniversary of the BMW BERLIN-MARATHON, NORQAIN will be unveiling a limited edition timepiece... Stay tuned. üëÄüî• #NORQAIN #BMWBERLINMARATHON

A few weeks ago, our team travelled to Nepal to visit a project very close to our hearts - the Butterfly Help Project founded by Andrea-Sherpa-Zimmermann and Norbu Sherpa. This non-profit organisation aims to help the children of sherpas who have lost their lives in the Himalayan mountains, providing them with education and shelter. In the village of Lungthung, they witnessed the impact of their collective efforts and projects. üèîÔ∏è 10% of proceeds from all NEVEREST watch sales are donated to the Butterfly Help Project, supporting children‚Äôs qualitative education. With donations from NEVEREST sales, we have been able to help Andrea and Norbu provide quality education to 50 children and built a hostel to accommodate the students close to their school. And the next project is already in the works! ü¶ã #NORQAIN #Adventure #Neverest #ButterflyHelpProject

We are proud to announce a new strategic partnership with the prestigious BMW BERLIN-MARATHON. This collaboration marks NORQAIN's second timekeeping collaboration with an Abbot World Marathon Major and embodies the values of perseverance, determination and the pursuit of excellence, which are at the core of our DNA. In celebration of our new role, a limited edition Wild ONE timepiece celebrating next year's 50th anniversary of the world's fastest marathon will be unveiled. In honor of our partnership with the BMW BERLIN-MARATHON, 10 lucky NORQAINERS will win a ticket and have the opportunity to be part of the NORQAIN Running Team on this mythic race course. #Norqain #Norqainer #bmwberlinmarathon #OfficialTimekeepingPartner

We are very proud to announce that we will be opening a new NORQAIN flagship boutique in Zurich this summer! We can't wait to welcome you to our flagship boutique in one of Switzerland's most beautiful cities and a place that has had great strategic importance for NORQAIN since our foundation in 2018. The official date of the store's opening will be revealed soon, so stay tuned for updates! Are you interested in joining the NORQAIN Zurich Boutique team? As we're getting ready to open our new store, we're also looking for a Sales Advisor to join our team. Follow this link to learn about the qualifications and requirements for the position: https://lnkd.in/e_X9e6rX be a NORQAINER - your life, your way!

Flashback to our Wild ONE launch event in Zermatt a couple of weeks ago. Together with many guests, family, friends, partners and #NORQAINERS we celebrated the launch of the Wild ONE collection, developed during the last 2 years, with the legendary, Jean-Claude Biver! Thank you to everyone that attended this unforgettable event and celebrated this special day with us! Last but not least thank you to our #NORQAINER community for your trust & support since day 1. This adventure wouldn't be possible without you!
